meanings.sent2: Artists enjoy using photopolymers for their quick-drying properties in sculpting.
meanings.sent3: The photopolymers in the workshop were so sensitive, they hardened just from a flashlight.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like photopolymers, setting firmly under the warmth of success.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors of the photopolymers under the UV light made the sculpture come to life.
